Title: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex - The Laughing Man
Writer: Junichi Fujisaku (screenplay), Shirow Masamune (manga), Yoshiki Sakurai (screenplay), Dai Satô (screenplay), Shotaro Suga (screenplay)
Actors: Alison Matthews, Russell Roberts, David Kaye, Trevor Devall
Plot: A compilation movie featuring scenes from Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex.
